org.jdesktop.jdic.misc
Interface Wallpaper

public interface Wallpaper

Sets the desktop back wallpaper.

Author:
Carl Dea

Field Summary
static int CENTER
          This mode will center the image on the desktop.
static java.lang.String[] MODE_NAMES
          These are the supported modes.
static int[] MODES
          These are the supported modes.
static int STRETCH
          This mode will stretch the image to fit the entire desktop.
static int TILE
          This mode will tile the image to fit the entire desktop.
 
Method Summary
 void setBackground(java.io.File fileName, int mode)
          This method will take a file name and mode to render the desktop wallpaper.
 void setBackground(java.lang.String fileName, int mode)
          This method will take a file name and mode to render the desktop wallpaper.
 

Field Detail

This mode will stretch the image to fit the entire desktop.

Method Detail

setBackground

void setBackground(java.lang.String fileName,
                   int mode)
This method will take a file name and mode to render the desktop wallpaper.

Parameters:
fileName - - The absolute file path.
mode - - Most desktops support Center, Tile, and Stretch

fileName - - The absolute file path.
mode - - Most desktops support Center, Tile, and Stretch
